title: does FF use webview2 ?
content:
Greetings , does FF use webview2 ? I am working on Windows11 with webview2 msEdge and PureBasic . But having difficulty getting proper support . I am building a freeware Kidsafe-Browser , that utilizes a File of Trusted Sites . Everything works great except when I come to youtube.com . For youtube , I would like to capture the URL when on-page-link is clicked . But can't get the support to finish this last step . https://www.purebasic.fr/english

So I am wondering , does FF have something similar to Windows msEdge webview2 that will allow a programmer to interact with Browser progress ?

Thanks for your help...
creator: vmars316
